languages.text: "Ситуация очевидна, Ваша Светлость". {n}Зауэрбэк осеняет себя {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилой{/g}.{/n} "Нам было послано знамение от Императора. Защитник Человечества хранит нас руками святых своих и упреждает о притаившейся угрозе".

"The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."
languages.original_text: "Ситуация очевидна, Ваша Светлость". {n}Зауэрбэк осеняет себя {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилой{/g}.{/n} "Нам было послано знамение от Императора. Защитник Человечества хранит нас руками святых своих и упреждает о притаившейся угрозе".

traits.locale_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

"The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

"The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

"The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

"The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

"The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

languages.text: «La situación está clara, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Sauerback hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} «El Emperador nos ha enviado un portento. El Protector de la Humanidad guía las manos de Sus santos sirvientes para protegernos y advertirnos de amenazas ocultas».
languages.original_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

traits.locale_text: «La situación está clara, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Sauerback hace el signo del Aquila.{/n} «El Emperador nos ha enviado un portento. El Protector de la Humanidad guía las manos de Sus santos sirvientes para protegernos y advertirnos de amenazas ocultas».

languages.text: 「状況は明らかです」{n}ザウアーバックは{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を結ぶ。{/n}「皇帝からのお告げです。人類の守護者は、我々を守り、隠された脅威を警告するために、聖なる従者たちの手を導いている」
languages.original_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

traits.locale_text: 「状況は明らかです」{n}ザウアーバックはアクィラの印を結ぶ。{/n}「皇帝からのお告げです。人類の守護者は、我々を守り、隠された脅威を警告するために、聖なる従者たちの手を導いている」

languages.text: “情况已经很清楚了，大人。”{n}苏尔贝克做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰手势{/g}。{/n}“帝皇赐予了我们预兆。人类的守护者引导祂的圣仆来保护我们，警告我们潜在的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

traits.locale_text: “情况已经很清楚了，大人。”{n}苏尔贝克做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“帝皇赐予了我们预兆。人类的守护者引导祂的圣仆来保护我们，警告我们潜在的威胁。”

languages.text: "Die Lage ist klar, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Sauerback macht das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}.{/n} "Der Imperator hat uns ein Omen geschickt. Der Beschützer der Menschheit führt die Hände seiner heiligen Diener, um uns vor verborgenen Gefahren zu warnen und zu bewahren."
languages.original_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lage ist klar, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Sauerback macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} Der Imperator hat uns ein Omen geschickt. Der Beschützer der Menschheit führt die Hände seiner heiligen Diener, um uns vor verborgenen Gefahren zu warnen und zu bewahren."

languages.text: « La situation est claire, Votre Seigneurie, {n}répond Sauerback en faisant le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} L'Empereur nous envoie un signe. Le Protecteur de l'Humanité guide la main de Ses serviteurs sacrés et nous met en garde contre une menace tapie dans l'ombre. »
languages.original_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."

traits.locale_text: « La situation est claire, Votre Seigneurie, {n}répond Sauerback en faisant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} L'Empereur nous envoie un signe. Le Protecteur de l'Humanité guide la main de Ses serviteurs sacrés et nous met en garde contre une menace tapie dans l'ombre. »

« La situation est claire, Votre Seigneurie, {n}répond Sauerback en faisant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} L'Empereur nous envoie un signe. Le Protecteur de l'Humanité guide la main de Ses serviteurs sacrés et nous met en garde contre une menace tapie dans l'ombre. »

languages.text: "Durum ortada {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Sauerback, {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıyor.{/n} "İmparator bize bir görü bahşetti. İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, bizi saklı tehlikelerden koruyup onlara karşı uyarmak için kutsal hizmetkârlarının maharetlerine kılavuzluk ediyor."
languages.original_text: "The situation is clear, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Sauerback makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a portent. The Protector of Mankind guides the hands of His holy servants to guard us and warn us of hidden threats."
